bannertext: 🔔 Take advantage of our special introductory offer
description: Accelerate your business growth and competitiveness through our expertise.
descriptionHeader: Boost your company's performance with tailor-made network solutions. We support SMEs and large organizations in the installation, management, and security of their IT infrastructures.

sectors.description: We support companies of all sectors with cutting-edge technologies

services_section.description: Complete solutions to support your digital transformation

engineering_design.title: Engineering / Design
engineering_design.description: Design of tailor-made network and IT architectures, aligned with your business challenges.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: Rapid and secure deployment of your technological solutions.

studies.title: Studies
studies.description: Strategic analyses to optimize your IT choices and maximize ROI.

audit_amoa.title: Audit / AMOA
audit_amoa.description: Independent evaluation and support for your digital transformation projects.

project_management.title: Project Management
project_management.description: Rigorous management guaranteeing controlled deadlines, costs, and results.

support_operations.title: Support and Operations
support_operations.description: Proactive supervision and maintenance to ensure continuity and performance.

it_training.title: IT Training
it_training.description: Adapted programs to sustainably strengthen your teams' skills.

application_development.title: Application Development
application_development.description: Custom software solutions adapted to your specific needs.

cta_section.description: Contact our experts today for a free consultation and discover how we can optimize your systems.

contact.hero_description: A question? A project? Let's talk! Our team is here to support your digital transformation.
contact.form_description: Click the button below and we'll get back to you.
contact.success_message: Your message has been sent successfully! We will contact you shortly.
contact.contact_subtitle: Multiple ways to contact us depending on your preference.
contact.phone_sentence: You can also contact us directly by phone at

descriptions.email: Write to us, we reply within 24h

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Based in Côte d'Ivoire, we operate in several West African countries and offer remote solutions for the rest of the continent.
faq.a2: For emergencies, we respond within 24 hours. For planned projects, we adapt to your constraints and timelines.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer different maintenance contracts tailored to the size and needs of your company.

errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.network: Connection issue. Check your internet connection and try again.
errors.not_logged_in: You need to be logged in to send a message. Please log in and try again.
errors.server_config: Server configuration error. Contact the administrator.
errors.unknown: Error sending message. Please try again or contact us directly by phone.

section_about.description: IT-EXPERTS-4-AFRICA is a company specializing in IT consulting and solution implementation, covering IT infrastructures, cloud, cybersecurity, and networks. Our brand is built on expertise, innovation, and a client-focused approach to optimize business technologies and foster their growth in Africa.
section_about.team_description: Certified professionals dedicated to your digital success

ingenierie-design.label: Engineering / Design
ingenierie-design.description: We design network and IT architectures tailored to your business needs, combining performance, security, and scalability.
details: HLD (High Level Design) and LLD (Low Level Design) architecture studies
Network topology diagrams (LAN, WAN, Datacenter, Cloud, SD-WAN)
Infrastructure sizing (servers, storage, virtualization)
Integration of cybersecurity constraints (segmentation, firewalling, zero trust)
Design of business continuity and disaster recovery plans (BCP/DRP)

implementation.label: Implementation
implementation.description: We ensure the deployment and integration of technological solutions with high quality standards.
details: Installation and configuration of network and security equipment (switches, routers, firewalls, WiFi, WLC)
Datacenter integration (servers, hypervisors, SAN/NAS storage, HCI, OpenStack/Kubernetes)
Infrastructure migration (LAN, WAN, Cloud, VoIP, collaboration)
Deployment of security solutions (antivirus, EDR, IAM, VPN, MFA)
Performance testing, validation, and production deployment

etudes.label: Studies
etudes.description: We carry out strategic and technical studies to guide your decisions and optimize your investments.
details: Feasibility studies (technical, economic, regulatory)
Technological benchmark and solution comparison (Cisco, Huawei, Fortinet, etc.)
Capacity planning and growth anticipation
ROI/TCO (Return on Investment / Total Cost of Ownership) analysis
Migration studies (Cloud, IP/MPLS, SD-WAN, IPv6, etc.)

audit-amoa.label: Audit / AMOA
audit-amoa.description: We support you in your digital transformation projects with an independent perspective.
details: Technical audit (network, security, systems, cloud, application)
Organizational audit (ITIL processes, IT governance)
Drafting of specifications and tender documents
Definition of sourcing strategy (choice of publishers/integrators)
Supplier monitoring and deliverable validation
Assistance with acceptance and testing (UAT, FAT, SAT)

gestion-projets.label: Project Management
gestion-projets.description: We manage your IT and telecom projects with method and transparency.
details: Management methodologies (PMI, Prince2, Agile, Scrum)
Development of planning, budgets, and RACI
Risk management and quality monitoring
Multi-team coordination (internal, partners, publishers)
Executive reporting and project communication
Change management and user support

support-exploitation.label: Support and Operations
support-exploitation.description: We ensure the availability and performance of your systems 24/7.
details: Proactive supervision (NOC/SOC, 24/7 monitoring, alerting)
Preventive and corrective maintenance
Incident and problem management (ITIL)
Patching and regular updates
Managed services (Managed Firewall, Managed LAN, Managed Cloud)
Continuous performance optimization (capacity management, tuning)

formation-it.label: IT Training
formation-it.description: We strengthen the skills of your technical teams and users.
details: Network and security training (Cisco CCNA/CCNP, Fortinet, Palo Alto)
Systems and cloud training (Linux, Windows Server, VMware, OpenStack, AWS, Azure)
DevOps and container training (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD)
Cybersecurity training (SOC analyst, ITIL security, user best practices)
Practical workshops and personalized labs

developpement-applications.label: Application Development
developpement-applications.description: We develop custom software and mobile solutions adapted to your business.
details: Web and mobile application development (Android/iOS)
Custom development (ERP, CRM, client portal, API)
Integration with existing systems (databases, middleware, REST/SOAP APIs)
UX/UI design and prototyping
Testing and quality assurance (QA, UAT, automation)
Evolutionary and corrective application maintenance

footer.description: We transform your ideas into innovative digital solutions. Our team of experts is dedicated to your success.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Receive our latest news and special offers

hero.description:
Accelerate your business growth and competitiveness through our expertise.

At IT  Experts 4 Africa, we help SMEs and large organizations transform their information systems into a real lever for performance.
From network architecture to cybersecurity, including infrastructure management and optimization, we design and operate reliable and scalable solutions, serving your business challenges.
